text:
Two examples of using toString() on a byte[] array, which is unlikely to produce the desired output:

ha.deploy.FileMessageFactory.writeMessage()
log message uses toString on msg.getData() which is a byte[] array

coyote.ajp.AjpMessage.dump
use toString on "msg" which is of type byte[]
creator: sebb@apache.org
markt@apache.org
text:
The first issue only affects debug messages.

The second issue doesn't match the code and is therefore invalid.

creator: chris@christopherschultz.net
text: Looks like AjpMessage.java:417 in trunk does concatenate "buf" with other strings and /will/ emit an ugly [B@abcd. :(

creator: chris@christopherschultz.net
text:
Created attachment 26261
Patch to show byte arrays as hex strings
Fixed in trunk. Will be in 7.0.6.
creator: chris@christopherschultz.net
